Data::Perl::Collection::Array(3) User Contributed Perl Documentation Data::Perl::Collection::Array(3)

NAME

Data::Perl::Collection::Array - Wrapping class for Perl's built in array structure.

VERSION

version 0.002011

SYNOPSIS

  use Data::Perl qw/array/;
  my $array = array(1, 2, 3);
  $array->push(5);
  $array->grep(sub { $_ > 2 })->map(sub { $_ ** 2 })->elements; # (3, 5);

DESCRIPTION

This class is a simple consumer of the Data::Perl::Role::Collection::Array role, which provides all functionality. You probably want to look there instead.

AUTHOR

Matthew Phillips <mattp@cpan.org>
